mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( id, productname, thumb, ordernum, status, amount, price, content, markettype, summary ) VALUES ( #{productname}, #{thumb}, #{ordernum}, #{status}, #{amount}, #{price}, #{content}, #{markettype}, #{summary} )
